channel.title: Divine & Debilitations bridge connection
channel.description:
So I started to build near a more civilized place.. So I found that random hilltop, and started to build there yesterday. I noticed a half finished bridge that seemed to be leading to nowhere, which is why I also started to build there.
SO.. I built a house & a tower, and then asked Divine if I couldn't finish the rest of the bridge. ( I forgot how to spell Divines full name -_- Divinefekth or something.. Lmao.)
End result?
Pure awesomeness RIGHT?
EDIT - I looked at the first two pictures before moving down to the third, it looks like I am flying but I'm actually not rofl. I'm standing on that tower in the 3rd picture. D;
--
My house.
[img]http://img705.imageshack.us/img705/6082/20110418122011.png[/img]
--
Divines house/bridge start.
[img]http://img29.imageshack.us/img29/5472/20110418122029.png[/img]
--
Bridge complete. (Sexier at night time) - I'm also standing on another tower in the area, not to sure who it's made by though. [img]http://img860.imageshack.us/img860/4343/20110418122059.png[/img]

thanks broskie. Walking across it takes forever though haha.

Use minecarts and boosters, makes it much more fun
